message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about aspect-based sentiment analysis using neural network architectures. The paper proposes a novel method for integrating aspect information into the neural model by modeling word-aspect relationships. This falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML), which are covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. Based on the content of the paper, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers NLP and related areas. The second most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), which covers ML and related areas. The paper also involves the use of neural networks, which is covered by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper involves information retrieval (IR) and optimization, which are covered by cs.IR and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), respectively.
